# Typography

## Text



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

`type Size = 'x-small' | 'small' | 'medium' | 'large' | 'x-large' | 'inherit'`    
`type BreakpointCustomizable<T> = { base: T; xs?: T; s?: T; m?: T; l?: T; xl?: T; }`

| Property   | Attribute  | Description                                                                                                                                                   | Type                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      | Default     |
| ---------- | ---------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ----------- |
| `align`    | `align`    | Text alignment of the component.                                                                                                                              | `'center'` <br> \| `'left'` <br> \| `'right'`                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           | `'left'`    |
| `color`    | `color`    | Basic text color variations depending on theme property.                                                                                                      | `'brand'` <br> \| `'default'` <br> \| `'inherit'` <br> \| `'neutral-contrast-high'` <br> \| `'neutral-contrast-low'` <br> \| `'neutral-contrast-medium'` <br> \| `'notification-error'` <br> \| `'notification-neutral'` <br> \| `'notification-success'` <br> \| `'notification-warning'`                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               | `'default'` |
| `ellipsis` | `ellipsis` | Adds an ellipsis to a single line of text if it overflows.                                                                                                    | `boolean`                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 | `false`     |
| `size`     | `size`     | Size of the text. Also defines the size for specific breakpoints, like {base: 'small', l: 'medium'}. You always need to provide a base value when doing this. | `'x-small'` <br> \| `'small'` <br> \| `'medium'` <br> \| `'large'` <br> \| `'x-large'` <br> \| `'inherit'` <br> \| `BreakpointCustomizable<Size>` | `'small'`   |
| `tag`      | `tag`      | Sets a custom HTML tag depending of the usage of the text component.                                                                                          | `'address'` <br> \| `'blockquote'` <br> \| `'cite'` <br> \| `'div'` <br> \| `'figcaption'` <br> \| `'legend'` <br> \| `'p'` <br> \| `'span'` <br> \| `'time'`                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     | `'p'`       |
| `theme`    | `theme`    | Adapts the text color depending on the theme. Has no effect when 'inherit' is set as color prop.                                                              | `'dark'` <br> \| `'light'`                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       | `'light'`   |
| `weight`   | `weight`   | The weight of the text.                                                                                                                                       | `'bold'` <br> \| `'regular'` <br> \| `'semibold'` <br> \| `'thin'`                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             | `'regular'` |
